```{r}
library(prim)
#library(dplyr)   #data wrangling
library(ggplot2) #plotting 
library(earth)   #fitting MARS models
library(caret)   #tuning model parameters
library( tidyverse)
library(glmnet)
library(PRIMsrc)
```



```{r}
source( "data_loader.R" )
temp = data_loader(Hour = 600)
data19 = temp$data_19
ac19 = temp$ac_19
```


```{r}
thr = c(0.25, -0.3)
x = select( data19 , -interpolated_acetic)
y = select(data19, c(interpolated_acetic) )
prim = prim.box(x= x, y= y$interpolated_acetic)
summary( prim )
plot(prim, alpha=0.5)
plot(prim, alpha=0.5, splom=FALSE, ticktype="detailed", colkey=FALSE)
```
